Specialization.Name: Aquatic
Specialization.Spells: Hydraulic Push#Slipstream#Aqueous Orb#Geyser#Control Water#Beast Shape IV#Summon Monster VII#Seamantle#World Wave
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell of the water type, your effective caster level is increased by one, and summoned creatures with a swim speed or the aquatic or water type gain a +1 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls
Specialization.Feat: Athletic, Brew Potion, Defensive Combat Training, Dodge, Mobility, Silent Spell, Skill Focus (Swim), Toughness
Specialization.Description: Your family traces its heritage back to the ocean depths, whether scions of undersea empires left in the wake of nomadic sea-tribes, or the spawn of creeping ichthyic infiltrators into remote seaside villages. The song of the sea hums in your blood, calling the waves and all those within to your command

Specialization.Name: Boreal
Specialization.Spells: Enlarge Person#Rage#Elemental Aura #Wall Of Ice#Cone Of Cold#Transformation#Giant Form I#Polar Ray#Meteor Swarm
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell with the cold descriptor, increase the spell’s save DC by 1
Specialization.Feat: Arcane Strike, Diehard, Empower Spell, Endurance, Exotic Weapon Proficiency, Power Attack, Skill Focus (Intimidate), Toughness
Specialization.Description: Descended from inhabitants of the lands of ice and snow, you count among your ancestors giant-kin, troll-born, and frost-rimed spirits. Their savage and raw energies flow down through generations to infuse you to the marrow with the chill of the polar wind, crackling auroras, and the long winter’s night

Specialization.Name: Orc
Specialization.Spells: Burning Hands#Bull’s Strength#Rage#Wall Of Fire#Cloudkill#Transformation#Delayed Blast Fireball#Iron Body#Meteor Swarm
Specialization.Power: You gain the orc subtype, including darkvision 60 feet and light sensitivity. If you already have darkvision, its range increases to 90 feet. Whenever you cast a spell that deals damage, that spell deals +1 point of damage per die rolled
Specialization.Feat: Diehard, Endurance, Great Fortitude, Intimidating Prowess, Improved Overrun, Power Attack, Toughness, Widen Spell
Specialization.Description: The rage of your ancestors burns within you, and the taint of savage orc blood flows through your veins. Your anger is never far from the surface, giving you strength and driving you to seek greater power

Specialization.Name: Shadow
Specialization.Spells: Ray Of Enfeeblement#Darkvision#Deeper Darkness#Shadow Conjuration#Shadow Evocation#Shadow Walk#Power Word Blind#Greater Shadow Evocation#Shades
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell with the [darkness] descriptor or the shadow subschool, you gain a circumstance bonus on Stealth checks equal to the spell’s level for 1d4 rounds
Specialization.Feat: Acrobatic, Blind-Fight, Dodge, Quick Draw, Silent Spell, Skill Focus (Stealth), Stealthy, Weapon Finesse
Specialization.Description: Spirits from the shadow plane dally at times in the world of light, and such as these lay with your ancestors once upon a time, imparting the mystery of shadow-stuff into your lineage. You are often sullen and withdrawn, preferring to skulk at the fringes of social circles and keep to yourself, cultivating an air of mystery and majesty that is all your own

Specialization.Name: Dreamspun
Specialization.Spells: Sleep#Augury#Deep Slumber#Divination#Dream#Shadow Walk#Vision#Moment Of Prescience#Astral Projection
Specialization.Power: Whenever you target a single creature with a spell, you gain an insight bonus equal to half the spell’s level (minimum +1) for 1 round to your AC and saving throws against any spell or attack made by that creature
Specialization.Feat: Alertness, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Deceitful, Heighten Spell, Improved Feint, Persuasive, Skill Focus (Sense Motive
Specialization.Description: Your family is a long line of dreamers, who dream not as ordinary mortals do but rather as those who reach through and touch the supernal realm of dreams and the farthest shores of night. Whether it is a gift or curse is not always clear, but your visions of the past and future call you ineluctably to a life of adventure

Specialization.Name: Undead
Specialization.Spells: Chill Touch#False Life#Vampiric Touch#Animate Dead#Waves Of Fatigue#Undeath To Death#Finger Of Death#Horrid Wilting#Energy Drain
Specialization.Power: Some undead are susceptible to your mind-affecting spells. Corporeal undead that were once humanoids are treated as humanoids for the purposes of determining which spells affect them
Specialization.Feat: Combat Casting, Diehard, Endurance, Iron Will, Skill Focus Religion, Spell Focus, Still Spell, Toughness
Specialization.Description: The taint of the grave runs through your family. Perhaps one of your ancestors became a powerful lich or vampire, or maybe you were born dead before suddenly returning to life. Either way, the forces of death move through you and touch your every action

Specialization.Name: Abyssal
Specialization.Spells: Cause Fear#Bull's Strength#Rage#Stoneskin#Dismissal#Transformation#Greater Teleport#Unholy Aura#Summon Monster IX
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell of the summoning subschool, the creatures summoned gain DR/good equal to 1/2 your sorcerer level (minimum 1). This does not stack with any DR the creature might have
Specialization.Feat: Augment Summoning, Cleave, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved Bull Rush, Improved Sunder, Power Attack, Skill Focus (Knowledge [planes]
Specialization.Description: Generations ago, a demon spread its filth into your heritage. While it does not manifest in all of your kin, for you it is particularly strong. You might sometimes have urges to chaos or evil, but your destiny (and alignment) is up to you

Specialization.Name: Djinni
Specialization.Spells: Shocking Grasp#Invisibility#Fly#Minor Creation#Overland Flight#Chain Lightning#Plane Shift#Greater Planar Binding#Wish
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell that deals energy damage, you can change the type of damage to electricity. This also changes the spell’s descriptors to match this energy type
Specialization.Feat: Dodge, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Skill Focus Planes, Weapon Finesse
Specialization.Description: You were born with the power of air genies, and the magic of the djinn is strong in you

Specialization.Name: Efreeti
Specialization.Spells: Enlarge Person#Scorching Ray#Fireball#Wall Of Fire#Persistent Image#Planar Binding#Plane Shift#Giant Form II#Wish
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell that deals energy damage, you can change the type of damage to fire. This also changes the spell’s descriptors to match this energy type
Specialization.Feat: Dodge, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Skill Focus Planes, Weapon Finesse
Specialization.Description: You were born with the power of fire genies, and the magic of the efreet is strong in you

Specialization.Name: Elemental
Specialization.Spells: Burning Hands#Scorching Ray#Protection From Energy#Elemental Body I#Elemental Body II#Elemental Body III#Elemental Body IV#Summon Monster VIII #Elemental Swarm
Specialization.Feat: Dodge, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Skill Focus Planes, Weapon Finesse
Specialization.Description: The power of the elements resides in you, and at times you can hardly control its fury. This influence comes from an elemental outsider in your family history or a time when you or your relatives were exposed to a powerful elemental force

Specialization.Name: Marid
Specialization.Spells: Obscuring Mist#See Invisibility#Gaseous Form#Wall Of Ice#Persistent Image#Elemental Body III#Plane Shift#Polar Ray#Wish
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell that deals energy damage, you can change the type of damage to cold. This also changes the spell’s descriptors to match this energy type
Specialization.Feat: Dodge, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Skill Focus Planes, Weapon Finesse
Specialization.Description: You were born with the power of water genies, and the magic of the marids is strong in you

Specialization.Name: Shaitan
Specialization.Spells: True Strike#Glitterdust#Greater Magic Weapon#Stoneskin#Wall Of Stone#Wall Of Iron#Plane Shift#Iron Body#Wish
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell that deals energy damage, you can change the type of damage to acid. This effect also changes the spell’s descriptors to match this energy type
Specialization.Feat: Dodge, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Skill Focus Planes, Weapon Finesse
Specialization.Description: You were born with the power of earth genies, and the magic of the shaitans is strong in you

Specialization.Name: Protean
Specialization.Spells: Entropic Shield#Blur#Gaseos Form#Confusion#Major creation#Disintegrate#Greater Polymorph#Polymorph Any Object#Shapechange
Specialization.Power: Your magic of creation and changing is hard to unravel. The DC to dispel transmutation or conjuration (creation) spells that you cast is increased by +4.
Specialization.Feat: Agile Maneuvers#Defensive Combat Training#Enlarge Spell#Great Fortitude#Improved Great Fortitude#Skill Focus:Craft#Spell Focus#Toughness
Specialization.Description: You have in your veins the ever-changing wildness of primal chaos, the raw essence of unbound creation. Your mind and spirit burst with the constant inspiration of consummate freedom, though you have difficulty following through on a task when another, new and exciting, catches your interest.

Specialization.Name: Maestro
Specialization.Spells: Ventriloquism#Hideous Laughter#Suggestion#Shout#Dominate Person#Mass Suggestion#Power Word Blind#Greater Shout#Wail Of The Banshee
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell with a verbal component and no somatic or material component, you treat your caster level as if it were one higher
Specialization.Feat: Deceitful, Greater Spell Focus (enchantment), Lingering Performance, Persuasive, Skill Focus (Perform), Spell Focus (enchantment), Spellsong, Still Spell
Specialization.Description: The spiritual power of art and song runs strongly through your family line. This may be the result of ancient pacts made with azata patrons, or even an inheritance from a lillend or trumpet archon ancestor. It could also be the lingering taint of a less savory heritage, such as from a harpy or a forefather driven to madness by the disquieting gibbering of a shoggoth. However it came to be, your family’s artistic bent shows itself strongly in your magic

Specialization.Name: Accursed
Specialization.Spells: Ray Of Enfeeblement#Touch Of Idiocy#Ray Of Exhaustion#Bestow Curse#Feeblemind#Eyebite#Insanity#Dimensional Lock#Energy Drain
Specialization.Power: You count as a hag for the purpose of joining a hag’s coven. The coven must contain at least one hag. In addition, whenever you are within 30 feet of another sorcerer with this bloodline or a witch with the coven hex, you can use the aid another action to
Specialization.Feat: Alertness, Blind-Fight, Combat Casting, Deceitful, Defensive Combat Training, Endurance, Great Fortitude, Mounted Combat
Specialization.Description: Misfortune, pestilence, and nightmares follow your family like vermin drawn to carrion. Somewhere in your family history, a hag’s foul influence entered your bloodline. You may actually be related to the hag, or you may still be suffering the effects of a curse that a hag laid upon your kin in generations past. Now the hag’s powers are part of your heritage

Specialization.Name: Draconic
Specialization.Spells: Mage Armor#Resist Energy#Fly#Fear#Spell Resistance#Form Of The Dragon I#Form Of The Dragon II#Form Of The Dragon III#Wish
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell with an energy descriptor that matches your draconic bloodline's energy type, that spell deals +1 point of damage per die rolled
Specialization.Feat: Blind-Fight, Great Fortitude, Improved Initiative, Power Attack, Quicken Spell, Skill Focus (Fly), Skill Focus (Knowledge [arcana]), Toughness
Specialization.Description: At some point in your family's history, a dragon interbred with your bloodline, and now its ancient power flows through your veins

Specialization.Name: Fey
Specialization.Spells: Entangle#Hideous Laughter#Deep Slumber#Poison#Tree Stride#Mislead#Phase Door#Irresistible Dance#Shapechange
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell of the compulsion subschool, increase the spell's DC by +2
Specialization.Feat: Dodge, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Mobility, Point Blank Shot, Precise Shot, Quicken Spell, Skill Focus (Knowledge Nature
Specialization.Description: The capricious nature of the fey runs in your family due to some intermingling of fey blood or magic. You are more emotional than most, prone to bouts of joy and rage

Specialization.Name: Starsoul
Specialization.Spells: Unseen Servant#Glitterdust#Blink#Call Lightning Storm#Overland Flight#Repulsion#Reverse Gravity#Greater Prying Eyes#Meteor Swarm
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast an evocation spell, targets that fail their saves are dazzled by tiny sparkling starlights for 1 round per level of the spell
Specialization.Feat: Blind-Fight, Craft Rod, Dodge, Endurance, Improved Counterspell, Improved Iron Will, Iron Will, Quicken Spell, Skill Focus (Perception), Toughness
Specialization.Description: You come from a line of stargazers and explorers who delved deeply into the darkness beyond the stars. In touching the void, the void touched them, and your mind, spirit, and body yearn to span the gulf between worlds

Specialization.Name: Stormborn
Specialization.Spells: Shocking Grasp#Gust Of Wind#Lightning Bolt#Shout#Overland Flight#Chain Lightning#Control Weather#Whirlwind#Storm Of Vengeance
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell with the [electricity] or [sonic] descriptor, increase the save DC by 1
Specialization.Feat: Deadly Aim, Dodge, Enlarge Spell, Far Shot, Great Fortitude, Point Blank Shot, Skill Focus (Fly), Wind Stance
Specialization.Description: You trace your heritage to fierce and proud spirits of storm and sky, and living lightning sings in your veins

Specialization.Name: Verdant
Specialization.Spells: Entangle#Barkskin#Speak With Plants#Command Plants#Wall Of Thorns#Transport Via Plants#Plant Shape III#Animate Plants#Shambler
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell with a range of personal, your skin toughens, granting you a natural armor bonus equal to the spell’s level for 1d4 rounds. This bonus does not stack with any other natural armor bonuses you might have
Specialization.Feat: Acrobatic Steps, Craft Staff, Endurance, Extend Spell, Fleet, Nimble Moves, Skill Focus (Knowledge Nature), Toughness
Specialization.Description: Your progenitors infused themselves with raw plant life, binding it into their own tissue and passing it down to their literal seed, giving you innate communion with nature

Specialization.Name: Oni
Specialization.Spells: ray of enfeeblement, invisibility, fly, charm monster, cone of cold, greater dispel magic, waves of exhaustion, trap the soul), dominate monster
Specialization.Feat: Combat Expertise, Combat Reflexes, Enforcer, Fast Healer, Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Power Attack, Skill Focus (Intimidate), Weapon Proficiency (katana)
Specialization.Description: As slaves of capricious oni lords, your ancestors were forced to yield to their masters’ hedonistic desires, inevitably tainting their descendents with oni blood. Now, you wield the powers of the oni thanks to your vile heritage

Specialization.Name: Destined
Specialization.Spells: Alarm#Blur#Protection From Energy#Freedom Of Movement#Break Enchantment#Mislead#Spell Turning#Moment Of Prescience#Foresight
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell with a range of “personal,” you gain a luck bonus equal to the spell's level on all your saving throws for 1 round
Specialization.Feat: Arcane Strike, Diehard, Endurance, Leadership, Lightning Reflexes, Maximize Spell, Skill Focus (Knowledge [history]), Weapon Focus
Specialization.Description: Your family is destined for greatness in some way. Your birth could have been foretold in prophecy, or perhaps it occurred during an especially auspicious event, such as a solar eclipse. Regardless of your bloodline's origin, you have a great future ahead

Specialization.Name: Celestial
Specialization.Spells: Bless#Resist Energy#Magic Circle Against Evil#Remove Curse#Flame Strike#Greater Dispel Magic#Banishment#Sunburst#Gate
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell of the summoning subschool, the creatures summoned gain DR/evil equal to 1/2 your sorcerer level (minimum 1). This does not stack with any DR the creature might have
Specialization.Feat: Dodge, Extend Spell, Iron Will, Mobility, Mounted Combat, Ride-By Attack, Skill Focus Religion, Weapon Finesse
Specialization.Description: Your bloodline is blessed by a celestial power, either from a celestial ancestor or through divine intervention. Although this power drives you along the path of good, your fate (and alignment) is your own to determine

Specialization.Name: Daemon
Specialization.Spells: Ray Of Enfeeblement#Touch Of Idiocy#Vampiric Touch#Contagion#Blight#Circle Of Death#Waves Of Exhaustion#Horrid Wilting#Soul Bind
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell that kills one or more living creatures with an Intelligence score of 3 or higher, the caster level of any spell you cast in the next round increases by +1 for each creature your first spell killed. This ability does not stack wi
Specialization.Power2: At 1st level, as a standard action, you can impose either starvation or thirst upon a living creature you can see within 30 feet. This requires the creature to make a Constitution check each round (DC 10 + 1 for each previous check) to avoid taking 1d6 po
Specialization.Power4: At 3rd level, you gain resist acid 5 and a +2 bonus on saving throws made against poison and death effects. At 9th level, your resistance to acid increases to 10 and your bonus on saving throws against poison and death effects increases to +4
Specialization.Feat: Diehard, Endurance, Fast Healer, Great Fortitude, Heroic Defiance, Heroic Recovery, Sickening Spell, Toughness
Specialization.Description: A daemon lurks somewhere along your family tree. Your powers derive from these soul-devouring fiends, who take pleasure and gain power from manipulating mortal frailties like aging, pestilence, famine, and the horrors of war. Your lineage gives you great insight into how to exploit the weaknesses of living beings and how to use leeched soul energy to enhance your wicked abilities

Specialization.Name: Pestilence
Specialization.Spells: charm animal, summon swarm, contagion, repel vermin, insect plague, eyebite, creeping doom, horrid wilting, power word kill
Specialization.Power: Vermin are susceptible to your mind-affecting spells. They are treated as animals for the purposes of determining which mind-affecting spells affect them.
Specialization.Feat: Brew Potion, Diehard, Endurance, Great Fortitude, Self-Sufficient, Skill Focus (Knowledge Nature), Silent Spell, Toughness
Specialization.Description: You were born during the height of a great magical plague, to a mother suffering from an eldritch disease, or you suffered an eldritch pox as a child, such that your very soul now carries a blight of pestilence within it

Specialization.Name: Aberrant
Specialization.Spells: Enlarge Person#See Invisibility#Tongues#Black Tentacles#Feeblemind#Veil#Plane Shift#Mind Blank#Shapechange
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell of the polymorph subschool, increase the duration of the spell by 50% (minimum 1 round). This bonus does not stack with the increase granted by the Extend Spell feat
Specialization.Feat: Combat Casting, Improved Disarm, Improved Grapple, Improved Initiative, Improved Unarmed Strike, Iron Will, Silent Spell, Skill Focus (Knowledge [dungeoneering]
Specialization.Description: There is a taint in your blood, one that is alien and bizarre. You tend to think in odd ways, approaching problems from an angle that most would not expect. Over time, this taint manifests itself in your physical form

Specialization.Name: Deep Earth
Specialization.Spells: Expeditious Excavation#Darkvision#Shifting Sand#Stoneskin#Spike Stones#Stone Tell#Repel Metal Or Stone#Earthquake#Clashing Rocks
Specialization.Power: Whenever you and the target of your spell are both underground, increase the spell’s save DC by +1
Specialization.Feat: Acrobatic Steps, Alertness, Blind-Fight, Forge Ring, Nimble Moves, Skill Focus (Perception), Stealthy, Still Spell
Specialization.Description: The echoing cave-songs and the rumble and creak of primal spirits deep below the ground thrum in your soul and in all your family line. You are likely slow, steady, and stable in your thinking, little prone to wandering and preferring to instead find depth in contemplation

Specialization.Name: Rakshasa
Specialization.Spells: Charm Person#Invisibility#Suggestion#Detect Scrying#Prying Eyes#Mass Suggestion#Greater Polymorph#Mind Blank#Dominate Monster
Specialization.Power: Add half your sorcerer level to the Spellcraft DC for others to identify spells you cast. If their checks fail by 5 or more, they mistakenly believe you are casting an entirely different spell (selected by you when you begin casting
Specialization.Feat: Arcane Armor Mastery, Arcane Armor Training, Deceitful, Detect Expertise, Empower Spell, Light Armor Proficiency, Martial Weapon Proficiency, Stealthy
Specialization.Description: At some point in your family’s history, one of your ancestors was tainted by the influence of a rakshasa. Though most of your family seem entirely normal, you have always felt your own skin is a prison from which magic allows you to escape. Your birthright is a secret you may be forced to keep from societies that would never deal with you if your heritage were known

Specialization.Name: Infernal
Specialization.Spells: Protection From Good#Scorching Ray#Suggestion#Charm Monster#Dominate Person#Planar Binding #Greater Teleport#Power Word Stun#Meteor Swarm
Specialization.Power: Whenever you cast a spell of the charm subschool, increase the spell's DC by +2
Specialization.Feat: Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Deceitful, Extend Spell, Improved Disarm, Iron Will, Skill Focus Planes, Spell Penetration
Specialization.Description: Somewhere in your family's history, a relative made a deal with a devil, and that pact has influenced your family line ever since. In you, it manifests in direct and obvious ways, granting you powers and abilities. While your fate is still your own, you can't help but wonder if your ultimate reward is bound to the Pit

Specialization.Name: Serpentine
Specialization.Spells: Hypnotism#Delay Poison#Summon Monster III #Poison#Hold Monster#Mass Suggestion#Summon Monster VII #Irresistible Dance#Dominate Monster
Specialization.Power: Your powers of compulsion can affect even bestial creatures. Whenever you cast a mind-affecting or language-dependent spell, it affects animals, magical beasts, and monstrous humanoids as if they were humanoids who understood your language
Specialization.Feat: Combat Casting, Combat Reflexes, Deceitful, Deft Hands, Persuasive, Silent Spell, Skill Focus (Bluff ), Stealthy
Specialization.Description: Your bloodline carries the lingering stain of ancient serpent races that ruled when the world was young; your forebears were likely favored slaves anointed by their reptilian masters and gifted with their cold cunning and subtle manipulation. While deception and a mesmeric charm are your birthright, you may struggle for truth in spite of your heritage

Specialization.Name: Arcane
Specialization.Spells: Identify#Invisibility#Dispel Magic#Dimension Door#Overland Flight#True Seeing#Greater Teleport#Power Word Stun#Wish
Specialization.Power: Whenever you apply a metamagic feat to a spell that increases the slot used by at least one level, increase the spell's DC by +1. This bonus does not stack with itself and does not apply to spells modified by the Heighten Spell feat
Specialization.Feat: Combat Casting, Improved Counterspell, Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Scribe Scroll, Skill Focus (Knowledge [arcana]), Spell Focus, Still Spell
Specialization.Description: Your family has always been skilled in the eldritch art of magic. While many of your relatives were accomplished wizards, your powers developed without the need for study and practice

Specialization.Name: Aberrant
Specialization.Spells: Enlarge Person#See Invisibility#Displacement#Black Tentacles
Specialization.Power: While bloodraging, you show the signs of our tainted heritage, and gain the abilities and immunities of some aberrations.
Specialization.Feat: Combat Reflexes#Great Fortitude#Improved Disarm#Improved Grapple#Improved Initiative#Improved Unarmed Strike#Iron Will
Specialization.Description: There is a taint in your blood that is both alien and bizarre. When you bloodrage, your taint manifests in peculiar and terrifying ways.

Specialization.Name: Abyssal
Specialization.Spells: Cause Fear#Bull’s Strength#Rage#Stoneskin
Specialization.Power: The power of the Abyss courses through your veins, causing horrific transformations during your bloodrage.
Specialization.Feat: Cleave#Great Fortitude#Improved Bull Rush#Improved Sunder#Intimidating Prowess#Power Attack#Toughness
Specialization.Description: Generations ago, a demon spread its filth into the essence of your bloodline. While it doesn’t manifest in all of your kin, in those moments when you’re bloodraging, you embody it to terrifying ends.

Specialization.Name: Arcane
Specialization.Spells: Magic Missile#Invisibility#Lightning Bolt#Dimension Door
Specialization.Power: When you bloodrage, arcane power transforms you into an arcane juggernaut who can cut down even the most careful caster.
Specialization.Feat: Combat Ref lexes#Disruptive*#Improved Initiative#Iron Will#Power Attack#Quick Draw#Spellbreaker
Specialization.Description: While others of your kin are powerful wizards and sorcerers, the eldritch nature of the blood coursing through your veins transforms you into a spell-breaking terror.

Specialization.Name: Celestial
Specialization.Spells: Bless#Resist Energy#Heroism#Holy Smite
Specialization.Power: Your bloodline grants a number of resistances and changes your form to something angelic and terrible when you bloodrage.
Specialization.Feat: Dodge#Improved Initiative#Iron Will#Mobility#Mounted Combat#Ride-By Attack#Weapon Focus
Specialization.Description: By way of either a celestial ancestor or due to divine intervention, the blood of angels runs though the veins of you and your kin. It grants majestic powers when you bloodrage.

Specialization.Name: Destined
Specialization.Spells: Shield#Blur#Protection From Energy#Freedom Of Movement
Specialization.Power: Your future is greatness, and the powers that you gain prove it to your enemies.
Specialization.Feat: Diehard#Endurance#Improved Initiative#Intimidating Prowess#Leadership#Lightning Ref lexes#Weapon Focus
Specialization.Description: Your bloodline is destined for great things. And when you bloodrage, you exude a greatness that makes all but mythic creatures seem lesser.

Specialization.Name: Draconic
Specialization.Spells: Shield#Resist Energy#FLy#Fear
Specialization.Power: The power of dragons f lows through you and manifests in a number of ways. At 1st level, you must select one of the chromatic or metallic dragon types. Once chosen, this cannot be changed. A number of your bloodrage powers deal damage and grant resistance
Specialization.Feat: Blind-Fight#Cleave#Great Fortitude#Improved Initiative#Power Attack#Skill Focus (Fly)#Toughness
Specialization.Description: At some point in your family’s history, a dragon interbred with your bloodline. Now, its ancient power fuels your bloodrage.

Specialization.Name: Elemental
Specialization.Spells: Burning Hands#Scorching Ray#Protection From Energy #Elemental Body I
Specialization.Power: One of the four elements infuses your being, and you can draw upon its power during your bloodrages. At first level, you must select an element: air, earth, fire, or water. Once chosen, this cannot be changed. A number of your abilities deal damage and gr
Specialization.Feat: Cleave#Dodge#Great Fortitude#Improved Initiative#Lightning Ref lexes#Power Attack#Weapon Focus.
Specialization.Description: The power of the elements resides in you, and at times you can hardly control its fury. This inf luence comes either from an elemental outsider in your family history or from a moment when you or your ancestors were exposed to powerful elemental forces.

Specialization.Name: Fey
Specialization.Spells: Entangle#Hideous Laughter#Deep Slumber#Poison
Specialization.Power: The power of the natural world saturates your being, and manifests itself when you bloodrage.
Specialization.Feat: Combat Ref lexes#Dodge#Improved Initiative#Lightning Ref lexes#Mobility#Step-Up#Intimidate Prowess
Specialization.Description: One of your ancestors was fey, or the fey realm somehow intermixed with your bloodline. It affects your bloodrage in tricky and surprising ways.

Specialization.Name: Infernal
Specialization.Spells: Protection From Good#Scorching Ray#Suggestion#Fire Shield
Specialization.Power: When you bloodrage, hellfire infuses with blood with terrifying effect.
Specialization.Feat: Blind-Fight#Combat Ref lexes#Deceitful#Improved Disarm#Improved Sunder#Intimidating Prowess#Iron Will
Specialization.Description: The Pit lives in your blood. Maybe one of your ancestors was seduced by the powers of Hell, or they made a deal with one its denizens, either way its corruption seethes within your lineage, and makes you fight with devilish ferocity.

Specialization.Name: Undead
Specialization.Spells: Chill Touch#False Life#Vampiric Touch#Fear
Specialization.Power: When you enter a bloodrage, the powers of undeath manifest, empowering your attacks with fear and your body with foul resistances.
Specialization.Feat: Diehard#Dodge#Endurance#Intimidating Prowess#Iron Will#Mobility#Toughness
Specialization.Description: The foul corruption of undeath courses though your veins. Somewhere in the past, death became infused with your lineage, which bestows frightening power when your bloodrage.

Specialization.Name: Agathion
Specialization.Spells: Shield Of Faith#Align Weapon (Good Only)#Tongues#Holy Smite#Dispel Evil#Planar Ally#Holy Word#Holy Aura#Summon Monster IX
Specialization.Description: You have pledged your life and soul to goodness and purity.

Specialization.Name: Ancestors
Specialization.Spells: Deathwatch#Gentle Repose#Speak With Dead#Rest Eternal#Slay Living#Geas/Quest#Destruction#Waves Of Exhaustion#Wail Of The Banshee
Specialization.Description: You see death not as something to be feared, but as a final rest and reward for a life well spent. The taint of undeath is a mockery of what you hold dear.

Specialization.Name: Arcane
Specialization.Spells: Magic Aura#Magic Mouth#Dispel Magic#Arcane Eye#Spell Resistance#Analyze Dweomer#Spell Turning#Protection From Spells#Mage's Disjunction
Specialization.Description: You are a true student of all things mystical, and see divinity in the purity of magic.

Specialization.Name: Ash
Specialization.Spells: Burning Hands#Produce Flame#Fireball#Wall Of Fire#Fire Shield#Fire Seeds#Disintegrate#Incendiary Cloud#Fiery Body

Specialization.Description: You are a crusader for your god, always ready and willing to fight to defend your faith.

Specialization.Name: Weather
Specialization.Spells: Obscuring Mist#Fog Cloud#Call Lightning#Sleet Storm#Ice Storm#Control Winds#Control Weather#Whirlwind#Storm of Vengeance
Specialization.Description: With power over storm and sky, you can call down the wrath of the gods upon the world below.

Specialization.Name: Spellkiller
Specialization.Description: Some inquisitor domains are not the domains of their faith but are movements within a number of faiths. Many religious individuals and orders find themselves in conflict with the users of arcane magic, and have created inquisitions and training regimens expressly to fight arcane spellcasters.

Specialization.Name: Black Powder
Specialization.Description: Some inquisitor domains are not the domains of their faith but are movements within a number of faiths. Many religious individuals and orders find themselves in conflict with the users of arcane magic, and have created inquisitions and training regimens expressly to fight arcane spellcasters.

Specialization.Name: Banishment
Specialization.Description: Your devotion to your deity is matched only by your hatred for fiends. You know the rites to cast evil outsiders back to the realms from which they hail.

Specialization.Name: Anger
Specialization.Description: Holy (or unholy) rage, granted by your patron deity, ensures that when you fight, the battle ends with a bloody victory.

Specialization.Name: Conversion
Specialization.Description: You are a powerful persuader. A honeyed tongue empowered by divine argumentation sways the indifferent and adversarial to your side.

Specialization.Name: Excommunication
Specialization.Description: You can repulse the influence of confused divine servants.

Specialization.Name: Fate
Specialization.Description: Fate is a powerful tool for those who dole out justice for their deity. You can read the strands of fate, and those strands guide your endeavors.

Specialization.Name: Fervor
Specialization.Description: Only a passionate and righteous will such as yours can ensure that justice will be properly done.

Specialization.Name: Final Rest
Specialization.Description: The dead have paid their dues; there is no need, and no excuse, for them to walk. You protect their rest personally.

Specialization.Name: Heresy
Specialization.Description: Often it is hard to tell heretics from the faithful. You use duplicity, stealth, and the heretics’ own arguments to root them out and bring them to justice.

Specialization.Name: Illumination
Specialization.Description: Many times an inquisitor’s greatest weapon is pure and unflinching illumination; errors are often illuminated by light and wisdom.

Specialization.Name: Imprisonment
Specialization.Description: Sometimes it is better to capture foes than to kill them—whether your intention is to punish them for their crimes or to torture them for information.

Specialization.Name: Justice
Specialization.Description: Some must learn that to submit to one’s fate often means submitting to your form of justice.

Specialization.Name: Oblivion
Specialization.Description: Some inquisitors believe that without faith there is only oblivion. But there are some divine servants who know enough about the darkness that lies beyond faith to use it as a tool… and a weapon.

Specialization.Name: Order
Specialization.Description: Most inquisitors fight insane aberrations and demonic creatures as well as the chaos of heresy. They use the dictum and the mantles of law in order to aid their struggle.

Specialization.Name: Persistence
Specialization.Description: Your deity chose you for your persistence. You have vowed to pursue the enemies of the faith to the world’s end if necessary.

Specialization.Name: Vengeance
Specialization.Description: Vengeance is justice naked of pretense. On your oath, you will deliver justice so unbounded.

Specialization.Name: Zeal
Specialization.Description: An inquisitor needs unyielding zeal in order to make sure her deity’s work is done.

Specialization.Name: Valor
Specialization.Description: It takes courage to confront the enemies of your faith.

Specialization.Name: Truth
Specialization.Description: To find truth, one has to wring honesty from others—whether in a friendly or hostile manner.

Specialization.Name: True Death
Specialization.Description: You see undead as a perversion of the natural order, a misuse of magic, or an unjust enslavement of a departed spirit's body, and are sworn to destroying such beings.

Specialization.Name: Torture
Specialization.Description: Only through pain can truth and justice come to the surface. And if that doesn’t work, at least you’ve enacted divine vengeance.

Specialization.Name: Tactics Inquisition
Specialization.Description: It is the cold and tactical mind that often wins the day. A proper, carefully considered sacrifice can inspire one’s allies to serve your cause.

Specialization.Name: Revelation
Specialization.Description: Evil often hides itself behind a mask of good. You are an expert at ferreting out those who are not what they seem, and use your powers to reveal the true forms of the unworthy.

Specialization.Name: Recovery
Specialization.Description: Some hunt down secrets, but you focus on the search for more tangible items.

Specialization.Name: Redemption
Specialization.Description: You reach out to your misguided fellows and give them every chance to turn back from conflict with the true faith, even if your differences come to violence.

Specialization.Name: Possession
Specialization.Description: You can invade the bodies of lesser beings and command them to bend to your will.

Specialization.Name: Reformation
Specialization.Description: You can speak with divine persuasiveness.

Specialization.Name: Sin
Specialization.Description: You know how to stoke the seven sins in others (envy, gluttony, greed, lust, pride, sloth, and wrath), and twist their dark desires to suit your own purposes.

Specialization.Name: Conversion Inquisition
Specialization.Description: You are a powerful persuader. A honeyed tongue empowered by divine argumentation sways the indifferent and adversarial to your side.

Specialization.Name: Chaos Blessing
Specialization.Subtype: Calistria, Cayden Cailean, Desna, Gorum,Lamashtu, Rovagug

Specialization.Name: Evil Blessing
Specialization.Subtype: Asmodeus, Lamashtu, Norgorber, Rovagug, Urgathoa, Zon-Kuthon

Specialization.Name: Good Blessing
Specialization.Subtype: Cayden Cailean, Desna, Erastil, Iomedae,Sarenrae, Shelyn, Torag

Specialization.Name: Law Blessing
Specialization.Subtype: Abadar, Asmodeus, Erastil, Iomedae, Irori, Torag, Zon-Kuthon

Specialization.Name: Abjuration
Specialization.Description: The abjurer uses magic against itself, and masters the art of defensive and warding magics.

Specialization.Name: Conjuration
Specialization.Description: The conjurer focuses on the study of summoning monsters and magic alike to bend to his will.

Specialization.Name: Divination
Specialization.Description: Diviners are masters of remote viewing, prophecies, and using magic to explore the world.

Specialization.Name: Enchantment
Specialization.Description: The enchanter uses magic to control and manipulate the minds of his victims.

Specialization.Name: Evocation
Specialization.Description: Evokers revel in the raw power of magic, and can use it to create and destroy with shocking ease.

Specialization.Name: Illusion
Specialization.Description: Illusionists use magic to weave confounding images, figments, and phantoms to baffle and vex their foes.

Specialization.Name: Necromancy
Specialization.Description: The dread and feared necromancer commands undead and uses the foul power of unlife against his enemies.

Specialization.Name: Transmutation
Specialization.Description: Transmuters use magic to change the world around them.

Specialization.Name: Universalist
Specialization.Description: Wizards who do not specialize (known as as universalists) have the most diversity of all arcane spellcasters.

Specialization.Name: Blackened
Specialization.Description: Your hands and forearms are shriveled and blackened, as if you had plunged your arms into a blazing fire, and your thin, papery skin is sensitive to the touch.

Specialization.Name: Clouded Vision
Specialization.Description: Your eyes are obscured, making it difficult for you to see.

Specialization.Name: Consumed
Specialization.Description: Your connection to Abaddon and the daemons that call it home has left you diminished but still able to scorn many mortal frailties.

Specialization.Name: Deaf
Specialization.Description: You cannot hear and suffer all of the usual penalties for being deafened.

Specialization.Name: Haunted
Specialization.Description: Malevolent spirits follow you wherever you go, causing minor mishaps and strange occurrences (such as unexpected breezes, small objects moving on their own, and faint noises).

Specialization.Name: Lame
Specialization.Description: One of your legs is permanently wounded.

Specialization.Name: Legalistic
Specialization.Description: The shackles of Hell impose savage consequences should you violate a covenant, but also imbue you with remarkable guile.

Specialization.Name: Tongues
Specialization.Description: In times of stress or unease, you speak in tongues.

Specialization.Name: Wasting
Specialization.Description: Your body is slowly rotting away.

Specialization.Name: Wolfscarred Face
Specialization.Description: Your face is deformed, as though you were born with a wolf's muzzle instead of an ordinary nose and jaw. Many mistake you for a werewolf, and in areas plagued by lycanthropes, you must take pains to hide your face.

Specialization.Name: Wrecker
Specialization.Description: The destructive power of the Abyss and its teeming hordes of demons seeps from your very pores and into your belongings and surroundings.
